openingRemarks:
Solve the following simultaneous linear equations

NB: Elimination method is used.

questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3x+y&=33 && (1) \\ 2x+y&=24 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(y\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (3x - 2x) + (y - y) &= 33 - 24\\ x&=9 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(x=9\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 2(9)+y&=24 \\ 18+y&=24 \\ y&=24-18 \\ y&=6 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 33 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 3x+y \) if \(x=9, y=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(9)+6 \\ &=27+6 \\ &=33 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 24 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( 2x+y \) if \(x=9, y=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(9)+6 \\ &=18+6 \\ &=24 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 3x+y&=12 && (1) \\ 3x+2y&=18 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(y\)

equation (1) × 2:

\[ \begin{align*} 6x+2y&=24 \qquad (3) \\ 3x+2y&=18 \qquad(2) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation(2):

\[ \begin{align*} (6x-3x) + (2y-2y)&= 24-18\\ 3x &= 6\\ \dfrac{3 x}{3}&=\frac{6}{3} \\ x&=2 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(x=9\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 3(2)+2y&=18 \\ 2y&=18-6 \\ 27&=12\\ \dfrac{2y}{2}&=\dfrac{12}{2} \\ y&=6 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS= 12 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 3x+y \) if \(x=2, y=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(2)+6 \\ &=6+6 \\ &=12 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS= 18 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( 3x+2y \) if \(x=2, y=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(2)+2(6) \\ &=6+12 \\ &=18 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 4a+2b &= 42 && (1) \\ 3a+2 b&=36 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(b\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (4a - 3a) + (2b-2b) &= 42-36\\ a&=6 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(a=6\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} 4(6)+2 b&=42 \\ 24+2 b&=42 \\ 2b&=42-24 \\ 2b&=18\\ \dfrac{2 b}{2}&=\dfrac{18}{2} \\ b&=9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS= 42 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 4a+2b \) if \(a=6, b=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=4(6) +2(9) \\ &=24+18 \\ &=42 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS= 36 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( 3a+2b \) if \(a=6, b=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(6)+2(9) \\ &=18+18 \\ &=36 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} c+d&=13 && (1) \\ c-d&=3 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(c\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (c-c) + (d --d) &= 13-3\\ 2d &= 10\\ \dfrac{2d}{2} &= \dfrac{10}{2} \\ d&=5 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(d=5\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} c-5&=3 \\ c&=3+5 \\ c&=8 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS= 13 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( c+d \) if \(c=8, d=5 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=8+5\\ &=13 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 3 in equation (2)
Evaluate \(c-d \) if \(c=8, d=5\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=8-5\\ &=3 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 2e+f=15 \qquad (1) \\ -2e+3f=13 \qquad (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(e\)

equation (1) + equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (2e+-2e)+(f+3f)&=15+13\\ 4f&=28\\ \dfrac{4f}{4}&=\frac{28}{4} \\ f&=7 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(f=7\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} 2e+7&=15 \\ 2e&=15-7\\ 2e&=8\\ \dfrac{2e}{2}&=\frac{8}{2} \\ e&=4 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 15 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 2e+f \) if \(e=4, f=7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(4)+7 \\ &=8+7 \\ &=15 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 13 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -2e+3f\) if \(e=4, f=7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-2(4)+3(7) \\ &=-8+21 \\ &=13 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 2g+5h&=32 && (1) \\ -4g+5h&=-4 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(h\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (2g--4g) + (5h-5h) &=32--4\\ 6g&=36\\ \dfrac{6g}{6}&=\dfrac{36}{6} \\ g&=6 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(g=6\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 2(6)+5h&=32 \\ 12+5h&=32 \\ 5h&=32-12\\ 5h&=20 \dfrac{5h}{5}&=\dfrac{20}{5} \\ h&=4 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 32 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 2g+5h \) if \(g=6, h=4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(6) +5(4) \\ &=12+20\\ &=32 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -4 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -4g+5h \) if \(g=6, h=4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-4(6)+5(4) \\ &=-24+20 \\ &=-4 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} j+2k &=22 && (1) \\ -7j-2k &=-46 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(k\)

equation (1) + equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (j + -7j) + (2k + -2k) &= 22 +-46\\ -6j&=-24\\ \dfrac{-6j}{-6}&=\frac{-24}{-6} \\ j&=4 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(j=4\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 4+2k&=22 \\ 2k&=22-4 \\ 2k&=18\\ \dfrac{2k}{2}&=\dfrac{18}{2} \\ k&=9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 22 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( j+2k\) if \(j=4, k=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=4+2(9) \\ &=4+18\\ &=22 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -46 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -7j-2k\) if \(j=4, k=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-7(4)-2(9) \\ &=-28-18 \\ &=-46 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -5m-6n&=-45 && (1) \\ -5m+6n&=15 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(m\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (-5m--5m) + (-6n-6n) &= -45-15\\ -12n&=60\\ \dfrac{-12n}{-12}&=\frac{-60}{-12}\\ n&=5 \\ \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(n=5\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} -5m+6(5)&=15 \\ -5m+30&=15 \\ -5 m&=15-30 \\ -5m&=-45\\ \dfrac{-5 m}{-5}&=\dfrac{-15}{-5} \\ m&=3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -45 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( -5m-6n\) if \(n=5, m=3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-5(3)-6(5) \\ &=-15-30 \\ &=-45 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 15 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -5m+6n=15\) if \(n=5, m=3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-5(3)+6(5)\\ &=-15+30\\ &=15\\ \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -4p-8q&=100 && (1) \\ -4p+6q&=-26 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(p\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (-4p - -4p) + (-8q-6q) &= 100--26\\ -14q&=126\\ \dfrac{-14 q}{-14} &=\frac{126}{-14} \\ q&=-9 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(q=-9\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} -4p+6 q&=-26 \\ -4p+6(-9)&=-26 \\ -4p-54&=-26 \\ -4p&=-26+54 \\ -4p&=28\\ \dfrac{-4 p}{-4}&=\dfrac{28}{-4} \\ p&=-7 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 100 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( -4p-8q\) if \(q=-9, p=-7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-4(-7)-8(-9) \\ &=28+72\\ &=100\\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -26 in equation (2)
Evaluate \(-4p+6q \) if \(q=-9, p=-7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-4(-7)+6(-9) \\ &=28-54\\ &=-26\\ \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -5r-8s&=67 && (1) \\ 5r+9s&=-71 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(r\)

equation (1) + equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (-5r+5r) + (-8s+9s) &= 67+-71\\ s&=-4 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(s=-4\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} -5r-8(-4)&=67 \\ -5r+32&=67 \\ -5r&=67-32 \\ -5r&=35\\ \dfrac{-5 r}{-5}&=\dfrac{35}{-5} \\ r&=-7 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 67 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( -5r-8s\) if \(s=-4, r=-7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-5(-7)-8(-4) \\ &=35+32 \\ &=67 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -71 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -5r+9s \) if \(s=-4, r=-7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=5(-7)+9(-4) \\ &=-35-36 \\ &=-71 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} u+4v&=-9 && (1) \\ -2u-4v&=6 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(v\)

equation (1) + equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (u+-2u) + (4v+-4v) &=-9+6\\ -u&=-3\\ u&=3 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(u=3\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} 3+4v&=-9 \\ 4v&=-9-3 \\ 4v&=-12 \\ \dfrac{4v}{4} &= \dfrac{-12}{4}\\ v&=-3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -9 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( u+4v \) if \(u=3, v=-3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3+4(-3) \\ &=3-12\\ &=-9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 6 in equation (2)
Evaluate \(-2u-4v \) if \(u=3, v=-3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-2(3)-4(-3) \\ &=-6+12\\ &=6 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 7w+9z &=100 && (1) \\ 7w+6z &=76 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(w\)

equation (1) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (7w-7w)+(9z-6z)&=100-76\\ 3z&=24\\ \dfrac{3z}{3}&=\dfrac{24}{3} \\ z&=8 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(z=8\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 7w+6(8)&=76 \\ 7w+48&=76 \\ 7w&=76-48 \\ 7w&=28\\ \dfrac{7w}{7}&=\dfrac{28}{7} \\ w&=4 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 100 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 7w+9z\) if \(w=4, z=8 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=7(4)+9(8) \\ &=28 + 72 \\ &=100 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 76 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( 7w+9z\) if \(w=4, z=8 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=7(4)+6(8) \\ &=28+48\\ &=76 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 6 x+2 y&=30 && (1) \\ 2 x+y&=12 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(y\)

equation (2) × 3:

\[ \begin{align*} 6x+2 y&=30 && (1) \\ 6x+3 y&=36 && (3)\\ \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} (6x-6x) + (3y-2y) &= 36-30\\ y&=6 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(y=6\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 2 x+6&=12 \\ 2 x&=12-6 \\ 2x&=6\\ \dfrac{2x}{2}&=\dfrac{6}{2} \\ x&=3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 30 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 6x+2y\) if \(x=3,y=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=6(3)+2(6) \\ &=18+12\\ &=30 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 12 in eq. (2)
Evaluate \( 2x+y\) if \(x=3,y=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(3)+6 \\ &=6+6\\ &=12 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 3x+2y&=26 && (1) \\ x+3y&=25 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(x\)

equation (2) × 3:

\[ \begin{align*} 3x+2y&=26 && (1) \\ 3x+9y&=75 &&(3) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} (3x-3x) + (9y-2y) &= 75-26\\ 7y&=49\\ \dfrac{7y}{7}&=\dfrac{49}{7}\\ y&=7 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(y=7\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 3x+2(7)&=26 \\ 3x+14&=26\\ 3x&=26-14 \\ 3x&=12\\ \dfrac{3x}{3}&=\dfrac{12}{3} \\ x&=4\\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 26 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 3x+2y\) if \(x=4, y=7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(4)+2(7) \\ &=12+14\\ &=26 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 25 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( x+3y\) if \(x=4,y=7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=4+3(7) \\ &=4+21\\ &=25 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 3a+2b&=40 && (1) \\ a+b&=16 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(a\)

equation (2) × 3:

\[ \begin{align*} 3a+2b&=40 && (1) \\ 3a+3b&=48 && (3) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} (3a-3a) + (3b-2b) &= 48-40\\ b&=8 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(b=8\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} 3a+2(8)&=40\\ 3a+16&=40\\ 3a&=40-16 \\ 3a&=24\\ \dfrac{3a}{3}&=\dfrac{24}{3} \\ a&=8 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 40 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 3a+2b\) if \(a=8,b=8 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(8)+2(8) \\ &=24+16\\ &=40 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 16 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( a+b\) if \(a=8,b=8 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=8+8\\ &=16 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 5c+12d&=133 && (1) \\ 6c+4d&=66 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(d\)

equation (2) × 3:

\[ \begin{align*} 5c+12d&=133 && (1)\\ 18c+12d&=198 && (3) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} (18c-5c) + (12d-12d) &= 198-133\\ 13c&=65\\ \dfrac{13c}{13}&=\dfrac{65}{13} \\ c&=5 \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(c=5\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} 6(5)+4d&=66\\ 30+4d&=66\\ 4d&=66-30 \\ 4d&=36\\ \dfrac{4d}{4}&=\dfrac{36}{4} \\ d&=9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 133 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 5c+12d\) if \(c=5,d=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=5(5)+12(9) \\ &=25+108\\ &=133 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 66 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( 6c+4d\) if \(c=5,d=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=6(5)+4(9) \\ &=30+36\\ &=66 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -14e - f &= -44 && (1) \\ -2e - 5f &= -16 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(f\)

equation (1) × 5:

\[ \begin{align*} -70e - 5f &= -220 && (3)\\ -2e - 5f &= -16 && (2) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} (-70e -- 2e) + (-5f--5f) &= -220--16\\ -68e &= -204\\ \dfrac{-68e}{-68} &= \dfrac{-204}{-68} \\ e&=3 \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(e=3\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} -2(3) - 5f &= -16 \\ -6 - 5f &= -16 \\ -5f &= -16 + 6 \\ -5f &= -10 \\ \dfrac{-5f}{-5} &= \dfrac{-10}{-5} \\ f &= 2\\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -44 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( -14e-f\) if \(e=3, f=2 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-14(3) - 2 \\ &= -42 - 2 \\ &= -44 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -16 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -2e-5f\) if \(e=3, f=2 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-2(3) - 5(2)\\ &= -6 - 10 \\ &= -16 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -4g + 8h &= -96 && (1) \\ -g + 4h &= -42 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(h\)

equation (2) × 2:

\[ \begin{align*} -4g + 8h &= -96 && (1) \\ -2g + 8h &= -84 && (3) \end{align*} \]

equation (1) minus equation (3):

\[ \begin{align*} (-4g--2g) + (8h-8h) &= -96 - -84 \\ -2g &= -12\\ \frac{-2g}{-2} &= \frac{-12}{-2} \\ g &= 6 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(g=6\) into equation (3):

\[ \begin{align*} -2(6) + 8h &= -84 \\ -12 + 8h &= -84 \\ 8h &= -72 \\ \dfrac{8h}{8} &= \dfrac{-72}{8} \\ h &= -9 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -96 in equation 1
Evaluate \( -4g + 8h \) if \( g = 6, h = -9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-4(6) + 8(-9) \\ &=-24 - 72 \\ &= -96 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -42 in equation 2
Evaluate \( -g + 4h \) if \( g = 6, h = -9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-6 + 4(-9) \\ &=-6 - 36\\ &= -42 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 36j - 2k &= -262 && (1) \\ -4j + 5k &= 53 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(k\)

equation (1) × -5, equation (2) × 2:

\[ \begin{align*} -180j + 10k &= 1310 && (3) \\ -8j + 10k &= 106 && (4) \\ \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (4):

\[ \begin{align*} (-180j --8j) + (10k + 10k) &= 1310 - 106\\ -172j &= 1204 \\ \dfrac{-172j}{-172} &= \dfrac{1204}{-172} \\ j &= -7 \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(j=-7\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} 36(-7) - 2k &= -262 \\ -252 - 2k &= -262 \\ -2k &= -262 + 252 \\ -2k &= -10\\ \dfrac{-2k}{-2} &= \dfrac{-10}{-2} \\ k &= 5 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -262 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 36j - 2k \) if \(j = -7, k = 5\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=36(-7) - 2(5) \\ &=-252 - 10\\ &= -262 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 53 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -4j + 5k \) if \(j = -7, k = 5\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-4(-7) + 5(5) \\ &=28 + 25\\ &= 53 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} 2m - 7n &= 36 && (1) \\ m - n &= 3 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(m\)

equation (2) × 2:

\[ \begin{align*} 2m - 7n &= 36 && (1) \\ 2m - 2n &= 6 && (3) \end{align*} \]

equation (1) minus equation (3):

\[ \begin{align*} (2m - 2m) + (-7n--2n) &= 36-6\\ -5n &=30 \\ \dfrac{-5n}{-5} &= \dfrac{30}{-5} \\ n &= -6 \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(n=-6\) into equation (2):

\[ \begin{align*} m - (-6)& = 3 \\ m + 6& = 3 \\ m &= 3 - 6 \\ m &= -3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 36 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( 2m - 7n \) if \( n=-6, m=-3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(-3) - 7(-6) \\ &=-6 + 42 \\ &= 36 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 3 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( m - n \) if \( n=-6, m=-3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-3 - (-6) \\ &= 3 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} p - 2q &= 21 && (1) \\ -4p + q &= -42 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(q\)

equation (2) × 2:

\[ \begin{align*} p -2q &= 21 && (1) \\ -8p + 2q &= -84 && (3) \end{align*} \]

equation (1) + equation (3):

\[ \begin{align*} (p + -8p) + (-2q + 2q) &= 21 + -84\\ -7p &= -63\\ \dfrac{-7p}{-7} &= \dfrac{-63}{-7} \\ p &= 9 \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(p=9\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} 9 - 2q &= 21 \\ -2q &= 21 - 9 \\ -2q &= 12\\ \dfrac{-2q}{-2} &= \dfrac{12}{-2} \\ q &= -6 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 21 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( p - 2q \) if \(p = 9, q = -6\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=9 - 2(-6) \\ &=9 + 12 \\ &= 21 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -42 in equation(2)
Evaluate \( -4p + q \) if \( p = 9, q = -6\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-4(9) - 6 \\ &=-36 -6\\ & = -42 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -5r - 110s &= 175 && (1) \\ -9r + 10s &= -101 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(r\)

equation (1) × 9, equation (2) × 5:

\[ \begin{align*} -45r - 990s &= 1575 && (3) \\ -45r + 50s &= -505 && (4) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (4):

\[ \begin{align*} (-45r - -45r) + (-990s - 50s) &= 1575 --505 \\ -1040s &= 2080\\ \dfrac{-1040s}{-1040} &= \dfrac{2080}{-1040} \\ s &= -2 \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(s=-2\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} -5r - 110(-2) &= 175 \\ -5r + 220 &= 175 \\ -5r &= 175 - 220 \\ -5r &= -45\\ \dfrac{-5r}{-5} &= \dfrac{-45}{-5} \\ r &= 9 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 175 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( -5r - 110s \) if \(r = 9, s = -2\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-5(9) - 110(-2) \\ &=-45 + 220 \\ &= 175 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -101 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( -9r + 10s \) if \( r = 9, s = -2\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-9(9) + 10(-2) \\ &=-81 - 20 \\ &= -101 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -20u-8 v&=-148 && (1) \\ 5u-2v&=53 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(u\)

equation (2) × 4:

\[ \begin{align*} -20u-8 v&=-148 && (1) \\ 20u-8 v&=212 && (4) \end{align*} \]

equation (1) + equation (4):

\[ \begin{align*} (-20u + 20u) + (-8v + -8v) &= -148 + 212\\ -16v &= 64\\ \dfrac{-16v}{-16} &= \dfrac{64}{-16} \\ v &= -4 \\ \end{align*} \]

Substitute \(v=-4\) into equation (1):

\[ \begin{align*} -20u-8(-4)&=-148 \\ -20u+32&=-148 \\ -20u&=-148-32 \\ -20u&=-180\\ \dfrac{-20u}{-20}&=\dfrac{-180}{-20} \\ u&=9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = -148 in equation (1)
Evaluate \( -20u-8 v \) if \(u = 9, v = -4\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=-20(9)-8(-4) \\ &=-180+32\\ &=-148 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 53 in equation (2)
Evaluate \( 5u-2v\) if \( u = 9, v = -4\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=5(4)-2(-4) \\ &=45+8\\ &=53 \end{align*} \]

\[ \begin{align*} -4w+104 z&=-448 && (1) \\ 5w-13 z&=92 && (2) \end{align*} \]

Proceed to eliminate \(w\)

equation (1) × 5, equation (2) × -4:

\[ \begin{align*} -20 w+520 z&=-2240 && (3) \\ -20w +52 z&=-368 && (4) \end{align*} \]

equation (3) minus equation (4):

\[ \begin{align*} (-20w --20w) + (520z-52z)&=-2240--368 \\ 468z &= -1872 \\ \dfrac{468 z}{468}&=\dfrac{-1872}{468} \\ z&=-4 \end{align*} \]
